items.content_html: A lightweight and intuitive web application built with React, Zustand, TypeScript, and React Hook Form, designed to efficiently manage veterinary patients. This app allows users to add, edit, and remove patient records, streamlining the organization and tracking of patient information for veterinary clinics.
items.title: Thomas465xd/patients-zustand: A lightweight and intuitive web application built with React, Zustand, TypeScript, and React Hook Form, designed to efficiently manage veterinary patients. This app allows users to add, edit, and remove patient records, streamlining the organization and tracking of patient information for veterinary clinics.
